inputs.selection_motivation: The copper → china_exports link is the weakest, lacking a canonical handle and a clear causal path to copper price movements.

prioritized_link.motivation: Copper price movements are a leading indicator of future inflation expectations; rising copper signals higher industrial demand and cost pressures, which feed into US inflation.
